name.description: name of docker image to be created

distDir.description: Specify name for custom build directory to use instead of `.wpnd`; provided value cannot leave project directory

srcDir.description: Specify name for directory that will contain the theme and plugin directory

skipDockerCheck.description: Specify if check for docker is skipped whilst attempting to provision environment

port.description: PORT on which app shall be exposed on

rebuildOnStart.description: Flag to help decide if image is rebuilt on start
